snippet.title: Bloody Roar 2 Story Mode Intro
snippet.description: The CG Story Mode Intro to Bloody Roar 2 ("Beasterizer 2" in Japan) It introduces us to some of the characters hints of the plots before you play them like any other PS1 CG at the time.
